oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Police Officers Standing Outside Housing Project, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of three unidentified Nashville Police officers standing outside a housing project, circa 1950s. Photographer unknown. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
